Location: HYBRID HEARING - Council Chambers - City Hall
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Economic Development and the Committee on Contracts

Items.Title: Oversight - A Good Food Purchasing Program for Citywide Food Procurement & Developing Preferred Vendor Lists for Community-Based Translation Services.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - A Good Food Purchasing Program for Citywide Food Procurement & Developing Preferred Vendor Lists for Community-Based Translation Services.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Economic Development and the Committee on Contracts
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a good food purchasing program
Items.MatterName: Creating a good food purchasing program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring agencies to develop and utilize a preferred vendor list to provide community-integrated translation and interpretation services and reporting in relation thereto
Items.MatterName: Requiring agencies to develop and utilize a preferred vendor list to provide community-integrated translation and interpretation services and reporting in relation thereto.
